titles.title: To repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to qualified tuition programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/27/2002--Introduced. Makes the sunset provisions of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 inapplicable to provisions of such Act relating to modifications to qualified tuition programs, thus making such provisions permanent.
